subtests.name: secondary click should set focus to clicked editable element and collapse selection around the clicked point
secondary click should move caret in an editable element
secondary click shouldn't move caret in an editable element if the default of mousedown event is prevented
secondary click shouldn't move caret in an editable element if the default of pointerdown event is prevented
Shift + secondary click should extend the selection
Shift + secondary click in a link shouldn't extend the selection
secondary mouse button down should move caret, but its button up shouldn't move caret
